name: Poor snake can you help it
name_original: Poor snake can you help it
description:
This is the story of a lost snake who begins his journey to find his family with a lot of good and interesting things in this journey. In the snake's journey, you will play as a snake to steal and troll anything but be careful of dangerous things do not touch them or you will pay the price.

The plot of the game tells about the life of a robber general with 3 stages:
+ Stage 1: Parent snakes drop eggs on stormy night
+ Stage 2: Snake goes to the wrong house, climbs to the top of a tree to see his house in the distance.
+ Stage 3: Snake finds its way to the right house

Poor Snake: Can you help? As a puzzle game, Use your brain to steal everything you want. Your smile is our passion. We are really happy with that. Each level is a story that will make you happy and relieve stress.
Train your logic. You are smart to solve all these tricky puzzles.

Good luck and download Poor Snake: Can you help it? now!
publishers: SOFT VIET DEVELOPMENT TECHNOLOGY AND INVESTMENT COMPANY
